channel.title: People cannot connect And I've done this BEFORE - Help Please SERIOUSLY :(
channel.description:
RIGHT,
I Have WoeshieScape ( Menno's Source ) Ands its 474 Okay. I Click RUN Server it comes up with Your server is now online! So I Open up the CLIENT THat i also downloaded which is woeshie scape client and i can login.
So i go on my LAPTOP Which is the same router ( Wireless connection ) DL The Sourrce and the client
So my servers running on my normal pc ( XP ) And i go On to my laptop open up client and click LOGIN.
Error connecting to server..
So i can login on my PC.. So i click run server on my PC.. And it connects BUT THEY'RE BOTH ON DIFFERENT ONES...
i tHINK Ive portforwarded right And im not sure so how can i get on the same server as my PC One? I Mean can someone help me out here something about Utorrent OH BTW I Have a Netgear D864GT Or Something :) Please help going footie training in.. 11 Minnutes REPLY ASAP!

item.title: People cannot connect And I've done this BEFORE - Help Please SERIOUSLY :(
item.dc:creator: @Sp3c_u_k0 Sp3c u k0
item.description:
@Sp3c_u_k0 wrote:

Literally i did portforward or i think i did, If i was to tell you what i did on my router maybe that could help me? Or Can i just use UTORRENT Just cause im lazy?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2009, 12:57:49 pm[/size][hr]Please, Im the only one whos posted a thread using proper understanding english yet noone can really help me out. Saying portforward is really sharp and quick.

I Went into my netgear Router…
Went to SERVICES -> Added Port TCP Runyounoobies ( thats the name ) And port 43594 And end 43594

Please someone reply… :@

Read full topic
